head.title: VisualDCT Release Notes
head.scope: This document is contains release notes of the current build.
head.audience: The audience of this document are all users of this VisualDCT build.

section.title: Release Notes
section.p:
Current build has the following disabilities:
include statement is implemented, but saving files containing include statements will also include all the content of includes files.
multiple template definitions in one DB are not supported
user's manual to be completed

Still there are quite a lot of ideas and nice features to be implemeted in the next releases:
all Package C items
recently used files list
search for objects
record morphing
pop-up menu for commonly used commands on objects
...
